paper_abstract: The current paper presents three case studies dealing with the integration of practical models, based on data-driven integration, model uni. cation and use of the universal modi. ed language ( UML) language. The four steps of this approach are detailed, highlighted with three examples: a model-oriented problematic, an application in a small and medium-sized enterprise (SME) context, and a methodological approach in the car-manufacturing context. Finally, a comparison of these three studies is discussed.
